nodes.text: EG-7 was a droid that lived on Tatooine and helped a Rebel agent complete a training mission to reprogram an Imperial droid factory.

The same design for EG-7 is used repeatedly in the game, as the stranded droid at the mass launcher training mission, the droid on the counterweight lift platform, and the repair droid on the moisture farm. Aside from EG-7, the same voice is used for each one of these power droids.
